title: To my fellow bronzes with Baron buff
body:
Tip: Don't go into your jungle to get farm, don't go back to base then split bottom as a poor split push champ, don't go and kill drake unless it's elder.
Push a lane with your team.

I have seen a few games now where my team has done this and it frustrates the shit out of me.
So many wasted baron buffs. 

The reason for this post, I just had a game as support where both Tryn and I were pinging top inhib tower because it was the eisiest to take with baron buff. Cait and Jax went back to base even though mid was pushed while our kat split pushed bot. After base Jax went jungle while cait went to take our red even though theirs was free to to take. 
Jax and Cait were on full health as Tryn tanked baron.
This lost us the game as both tryn and I were gunned down trying to get top while the other three just wasted baron buff.
I hate bronze plays sometimes.
